gw.api.util

Class WrapperException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • gw.pl.exception.GWWrapperException
            • gw.api.util.WrapperException
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RetryableException

    public class WrapperException
extends GWWrapperException
    This class is used to wrap exceptions to capture additional information as the stack is being unwound. It intentionally does not have messageless constructors nor causeless constructors

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Throwable

        Cause, LocalizedMessage, Message, StackTrace, Suppressed

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WrapperException(com.guidewire.pl.system.locale.DisplayKey message, java.lang.Object[] msgArgs, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      This will create a new wrapper exception around the passed in cause.
      WrapperException(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      This will create a new wrapper exception around the passed in cause.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getCauseOfType(Type<T> causeType)
      Gets the nearest Throwable of the given type in this Throwable chain. Returns this object if it is of the given type. Returns null if no Throwable exists in the cause chain that is of the given type.
